intro.description: So, our run is complete, we can now have a look at the outputs. Now in this instance - we weren't asking for much, so it shouldn't take very long.

item.title: Find the output folder
item.description: As you'll remember, we specified that the OutputDirectory should be results. So, in your Navigator view, check for the presence of the results folder. And have a look inside.

item.title: View a results plot
item.description: In the results folder you'll find a number of files. One of which will be the product of the TrackPlotObserver, a .png file. Double-click on this file, and Windows will show the image created - produced by Debrief.

item.title: View Debrief tracks
item.description: As well as Debrief producing a snapshot overview of the run, we can run through the scenario using Debrief. To do this, double-click on the .rep file in the results folder. As the plot opens, you may get invited to select between DR and OTG track mode - select OTG. The file will open in Debrief. If you select the Time Controller view, you can move back and forth through the scenario.

item.title: And Debrief narrative
item.description: Lastly - still with the Debrief plot viewer open, if you open the Narrative Viewer view, you'll see a list of decisions made during the scenario. Note, you may have to switch to Tactical Analysis mode to see the Narrative Viewer. Scroll back and forth with the Time Controller and see the fishing vessel's current decision state in the Narrative Viewer.
